name: STATE v. Elbert BARNES et al.

parties: STATE v. Elbert BARNES et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The motion for counsel fee is granted and Anthony E. Grilli is awarded the sum of $750 for services rendered on behalf of defendant Elbert Barnes in the prosecution of this appeal.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. LaSalle, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Anthony E. Grilli, Providence, for defendant Elbert Barnes.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Elbert BARNES et al.
No. 78-224-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 24, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. LaSalle, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Anthony E. Grilli, Providence, for defendant Elbert Barnes.
